content: **if you would like to download kelley s ponchito please go to lovecrafts com** kelley s ponchito is a light and lacy poncho crocheted from** side to side as a single rectangle and then seamed to create the poncho shape the neck opening is crocheted last kelley s ponchito offers a change from the usual wrap and shawl shapes however the design can be crocheted and worn as a rectangular wrap as well dimensions the completed and blocked piece is 31 in 78 cm around the top of the neck and 25 in 63 cm from the top to the poncho point the following stitches were used chain double_crochet extended single_crochet foundation single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch the pattern pdf includes 6 photos and a schematic to aid you in creating the poncho shape i am currently working on a large version of this design i would like to thank my wonderful testers-- alivaz 1 wedewschool 2 sunmoonstars75 3 and rejectranch 4 and by the way wedewschool is my friend kelley we have fun working together at our local lys please send me a message if you have any questions about this design or join our group crochetworks 5 we love to talk about crocheting and yarn *february 9 2015 the large version of kelley s ponchito is now available thank you again to alivaz for testing the large version of this design thank you also to jam52 6 for testing the large version another of our testers is working on a modification to it so that we may be able to offer an extra-large version in the near future * june 2015 kelley s ponchito is the pattern for a crochet shoulder wrappers cal 7 1 http //www ravelry com/people/alivaz 2 http //www ravelry com/people/wedewschool 3 http //www ravelry com/people/sunmoonstars75 4 http //www ravelry com/people/rejectranch 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/crochetworks 6 http //www ravelry com/people/jam52 7 http //www ravelry com/discuss/crochet-shoulder-wrappers/3209190/1-25
